sense.def:
A lot of something
ali
lots of something
je velika količina nečesa.

seg.quote: We owed a lot of money.
This is a subject that worries a lot of people.
I feel that we have a lot to offer.
...a big house with lots of windows.
Wilks bet his last ten pounds and lost the lot.
They were a rather arrogant boring lot.

sense.def:
Vrsto ali skupino stvari lahko imenujemo
a particular lot
.

seg.quote: ...two sets of cards, one lot written in blue, the other in red.
I get two lots of everything.

sense.def:
Na dražbi je
a lot
eden od predmetov, ki jih tam prodajajo.

seg.quote: Lot No 359 was a folder of 11 original sketches.

sense.def:
A lot
pomeni zelo veliko ali zelo pogosto.

seg.quote: The man in the photograph looked a lot like Mr Williams.
The weather's a lot warmer there.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
draw lots
ali
cast lots
, vsaka oseba vzame papirnat listek iz posode, da odločijo, kdo bo nekaj storil. Izbrana je oseba, ki vzame listek, drugačen od vseh drugih.
